Rep: Joe Barton's claim that there is language in the healthcare.gov code waiving users' right to privacy of personal information.
The code in question: which includes the line "You have no reasonable expectation of privacy regarding any communication or data transiting or stored on this information system."
The explanation provided by CGI Federal: one of the government contractors responsible for the code, stating that the line was not intended for public users but for exchange employees who have access to consumer data.
